author: Victor Leung
title: Update: Problem Set Policy
question:
Please note that we have updated the problem set policy in the course syllabus from:
You can work on each problem set alone or with one other student in the same lecture section. If you work with another student, you must submit a single shared assignment for both students.
to:
You can work on each problem set alone or with one other student in the course. If you work with another student, you must submit a single shared assignment for both students.
Note that you can change partners through the term, but each problem set must be done either alone or with a single partner. So, if you are already working with a partner for Problem Set 2, you cannot change partners for Problem Set 2.
